# lcmrl4jecs

This package is to implement the LCMRL code developed by Dr Steven C. Wendelken at US EPA into a package. This is not inteded for distribution.

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

## Installation

You can install the development version of lcmrl4jecs from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("fabregithub/lcmrl4jecs")
```
